Inti package is a collection of different applications and procedures used in plant breeding and experimental designs.

## Installation

<!-- You can install the released version of inti from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with: -->

<!-- ``` r -->
<!-- install.packages("inti") -->
<!-- ``` -->

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/Flavjack/inti) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Flavjack/inti")
```
## Shiny apps

### Yupana

```{r eval=F}
inti::yupana()
```
### Tarpuy

```{r eval=F}
inti::tarpuy()
```

### Rticles

```{r eval=F}
inti::rticles_addin()
```
